item.title: Scale dash strokes
item.description:
From tartami...@gmail.com on December 26, 2013 16:25:43
I think it is incoherent to scale stroke-width according to zoom-level and leave dash-stroke untouched. Especially with round linecaps, when zooming in the actual dash distance decreases to the point that dashes touch each other(because of the growing linecap radius). There should be an option to scale both (similar to scale-radius for circles).
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=471

item.contents:
From LudwigBr...@gmail.com on January 25, 2014 00:37:48
The dash now scales together with the stroke width in Rescue.
Status: Fixed
